What causes Reticulohistiocytoma ?,"What causes reticulohistiocytoma? While it is known that reticulohistiocytoma (RH) develop due to a rapid production of immune cells (histiocytes) in the skin or soft tissues, the cause of this process is not currently known.",GARD,Reticulohistiocytoma
